body.p: Organized as part of the Act of July 16, 1798 to raise additional regiments for the United States Army. Officially organized as of January 1799. Notable wars involved in leading up to American Civil War: War of 1812 and Mexican-American War. Commanding officer during Civil War: George Wright (September 28, 1861- July 30, 1865).
